name: DrgstatusAdmission
title: drgstatusAdmission
description: Code system of concepts specifying the admission status for the diagnosis related group (DRG) determination. US Realm. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the DRG segment.

concepts.display: Admission status is valid; used for grouping
Admission status is valid; not used for grouping
Admission status is invalid; not used for grouping
Admission status is invalid; default value used for grouping
